channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ClickBank Affiliate Ads
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ClickBank Affiliate Ads

item.title: CVE-2015-20106|2024-08-06T08:58:26.478Z -- unknown -- clickbank%20affiliate%20ads
item.description: The ClickBank Affiliate Ads WordPress plugin through 1.20 does not escape its settings, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html is disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2015-20105|2024-08-06T08:58:26.450Z -- unknown -- clickbank%20affiliate%20ads
item.description: The ClickBank Affiliate Ads WordPress plugin through 1.20 does not have CSRF check when saving its settings, allowing attacker to make logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack. Furthermore, due to the lack of escaping when they are outputting, it could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
